name: Counter Commander go games
description:
Counter soldier GO Killing Shot

Counter soldier GO Killing Shot is a first-person 3D shooter game.

You will play as a sniper, strike terrorists. Your task is to fight against
terrorists bases and destroy X City terrorist remnants, to effectively combat terrorist activities.

You can use the killer rifle zoom lens, adjust the amplification factor by the right side of the slider.

Kill the enemy can get gold awards, gold can be used to buy weapons and ammunition. Let you experience the feeling of different
weapons. This is a real sniper war!

key features:

=> Excellent city 3D environment 
=> First person Shooting 
=> Sniper scope view
 => Enjoy realistic gun simulation and animation! 
=> Full addictive control of latest shooting sniper rifle
